sentences.english: And I was very impressed by the Belfast Ecclesia. If.
sentences.chinese: 貝爾法斯特教會給我留下了深刻的印象。

sentences.english: Mayes said the babies were beingcared for in intensive care in Belfast.
sentences.chinese: 梅斯說，嬰兒們正在貝爾法斯特受到出格護理。

sentences.english: Higgins was discovered at a block of flats in the centre of Belfast.
sentences.chinese: 希金斯是在貝爾法斯特市中心的一棟公寓被發現的。
巴利米納，離貝爾法斯特30英里遠。

sentences.english: The Prime Minister insisted on going walkabout in Belfast.
sentences.chinese: 首相堅持要到貝爾法斯特民衆中走動走動。
